ROM.Changelog: ## VertexOS Changes * Undervolt on all the frequencies (less battery consume) * Tune interactive config * Switch to row io sched for faster app launch and better perf. (google knew what's best, hands down.) * Switch to bfq io sched for external sd card if available, for faster io * Decreased readahead to 512 and increased readahead to 2048 for external for better throughput * Increase freq. boost to 1036 Mhz to get going with interactive config for buttery smooth UI/UX * Merged latest CAF tag * Minor optimisations # Note : Clean flash is always recommended. Bug reports are not appreciated if not clean flashed. Builds will be available soon when maintainers will get free time. So don't ask for ETAs. ## Note for this build: If you use Kernel Adiutor or similar apps, reset their changements to let be applied latest changements, if you do a dirty flash. ---
